title: Aluminum Curtain Wall — Dubai
overview: High-performance aluminum curtain wall with thermal breaks, clean sightlines, and coordinated finishes for a premium commercial tower.
description: Unitized panels with custom glazing, integrated sun-shading, and weather seals for durability and energy efficiency. Fabrication followed strict QA, ensuring alignment, airtightness, and rapid on-site installation. Tailored mullion and transom depths achieve both structural rigidity and aesthetic rhythm.

title: Industrial Steel Structure — Sharjah
overview: Heavy-duty steel frame with mezzanines, platforms, and integrated safety systems for an industrial facility.
description: Designed for high loads and aggressive environments: galvanized members, fire-proofing allowances, and bolted connections for fast erection. Includes overhead crane rails, ladders, handrails, and anti-slip grating for safe circulation. Coordinated embeds and anchor bolts delivered accurate, swift site assembly.

title: Residential Steel Staircase — Abu Dhabi
overview: Custom floating steel staircase with glass balustrades, precision-welded stringers, and a premium powder-coated finish.
description: Laser-cut components, concealed fixings, and vibration control deliver a seamless, quiet ascent. Curated treads with anti-slip inserts and low-iron glass rails provide clarity and safety. Installed with millimeter accuracy to align with interior finishes and lighting details.
